DEFECT.DESCRIPTION:
Cast cannot be proven safe: "static_cast<const struct WNF_IMMERSIVE_MODE_DATA[WNF_IMMERSIVE_MODE_DATA::rgMonitorData] *>(pvBuffer)" Accessing 16 bytes starting at byte offset 0 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE Values of variables: PREFAST_NEWLINE Pointer pvBuffer is at offset offset(pvBuffer)`22 bytes from the start of the buffer PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE There are other instances of this error: PREFAST_NEWLINE Potential read overflow using expression '(pModeData->rgMonitorData[pModeData->cMonitorData]).fIsImmersive' at line 29 PREFAST_NEWLINE
